message.raw:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
  (and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
  when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
  --allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
  substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
  regenerated when replotting.

Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default

Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
regenerated when replotting.

message:
